page.title: 11Local Employment
page.content: Within the area of study there is quite a high rate of unemployment.The jobs which are available within the area are very limited.At the moment the most jobs are connected with agriculture,the primary land use within the area,there are other sources of employment however.These other sources of employment are on a small scale,mainly small firms or family businesses.There is a small metal manufacturing firm in Ramshaw called West Tees Engineering,a roofing firm in Evenwood ,a family printing firm called Northern Graphics and shops which employ assistants.The majority of people who are employed and live in the area have to travel out of the area to their place of work.
